data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Far-Western, Nepal to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Far-Western, Nepal
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Far-Western who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Far-Western, Nepal.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Far-Western.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Far-Western, Nepal know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bahna (Hindu traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bahna (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Far-Western, Nepal to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Far-Western, Nepal, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Far-Western words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Far-Western
